import React, { useState } from 'react' function RatingSelect({getRating}) { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(10) const handleChange = (e) =>{ const rating = +e.currentTarget.value setSelected(rating) getRating(rating) } return (
  • handleChange(e)} checked={selected === 1} />
  • handleChange(e)} checked={selected ===2} />
  • handleChange(e)} checked={selected ===3} />
) } export default RatingSelect
